title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
ach the Iron Throne. Once you land on Iron Throne, you will have only 8 turns to extract as many prisoners as possible and Escape to the submersible to dock before the Throne collapses. Dimensional door and Teleportation Circle spells are very helpful, as well as the Potion of Speed.

If you turned down Mizora, she may appear once you free Duke Ravengard. Defeat her summoning, and don't let the explosion kill the duke.

Continue to the Iron Throne. A cutscene will begin and the journals will upd
